Detailed Description

Class OuteredgeGeometry manages the mapping between the AMR index and the outeredge geometry index space. It is a subclass of hier::BoxGeometry and it computes intersections between outeredge box geometries and edge or outeredge box geometries for communication operations.

See header file for OuteredgeData<TYPE> class for a more detailed description of the data layout.

See also:
hier::BoxGeometry
EdgeGeometry
EdgeOverlap

const hier::IntVector &  ghosts 
)

Construct an outeredge geometry object given an AMR index space box and ghost cell width.

Precondition:
box.getDim() == ghosts.getDim()
ghosts.min() >= 0

References SAMRAI::hier::IntVector::min(), TBOX_ASSERT, and TBOX_ASSERT_OBJDIM_EQUALITY2.

Member Function Documentation

hier::Box SAMRAI::pdat::OuteredgeGeometry::toOuteredgeBox ( const hier::Box &  box,
tbox::Dimension::dir_t  axis,
tbox::Dimension::dir_t  face_normal,
int  side 
) [static]

Convert a given box in the standard cell-centered AMR index space to an outeredge geometry box for the specified axis, face normal, and lower/upper side. See OuteredgeData header file for a detailed description of an outeredge box.

Precondition:
(0 <= axis) && (axis < dim.getValue())
(0 <= face_normal) && (face_normal < dim.getValue())
(face_normal != axis)
(side == 0) || (side == 1)

References SAMRAI::hier::Box::empty(), SAMRAI::hier::Box::getDim(), SAMRAI::hier::Box::lower(), SAMRAI::hier::Box::setLower(), SAMRAI::hier::Box::setUpper(), TBOX_ASSERT, SAMRAI::pdat::EdgeGeometry::toEdgeBox(), and SAMRAI::hier::Box::upper().

Referenced by SAMRAI::pdat::OuteredgeData< TYPE >::getDataBox(), SAMRAI::pdat::OuteredgeData< TYPE >::getSizeOfData(), and SAMRAI::pdat::OuteredgeData< TYPE >::OuteredgeData().
